page.title: 07MANAGING COVENTRY S.W.
page.content: In this sector there is Coventry's Council House and Offices.The Chamber where the elected councillors meet every month is there.Councillors are elected for a term of three years.They belong to one of two political parties Labour or Conservative.The Labour Party have the majority at the moment, so they hold the power.The various departments like Housing and Education carry out the instructions of the committees of councillors.They are run by paid officials and people are employed to carry out the work.The money to pay for this comes from local rates and a grant from Central Government.The full council meetings are chaired by the Lord Mayor who is elected each year as the leading citizen who also performs many civic duties representing the City of Coventry.
